alert.note: Alert for Kohala; Kona (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 01 at 3:22PM HST until December 02 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI THROUGH TONIGHT... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF THE BIG ISLAND TONIGHT AND FRIDAY... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI ON FRIDAY... .A large, long period west northwest swell (300-310 degrees) will peak this afternoon and evening then decrease on Friday. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM HST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Surf rising to 6 to 8 feet tonight and holding through Friday. * WHERE...Kona and Kohala. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 PM HST Friday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
